name: Kube Clock - White-US Plug
description:
Guest Features

  • Built-in charging cables for Apple lightning, Apple 30 pin and Micro USB
  • Additional charging via two (2) USB ports
  • High quality speaker for audio streaming via Bluetooth
  • Large Clock display with Single Day Alarm
  • Auto-fading dimmer function
  • Auxiliary port for streaming music from 3.5mm headphone jack
  • Replaceable cables to extend life of the product
  • 12 month Warranty
  • Colour: White with chrome speaker grills and mirrored display
  • Packaging: 270mm x 151mm x 100mm
  • Weight: 0.925 kg
  • Unit: 105mm x 105mm x 58mm
  • Weight: 0.50 kg

Hotel Specific Features

  • Compact and contemporary design to suit bedside tables
  • Time adjustment buttons located underneath clock to avoid guest changes
  • Built-in cables reduce concierge cable delivery to rooms
  • Replaceable cables to extend life of the product
  • Pairing button for simple guest connection for audio streaming
  • Room programmer for custom adjustment of default settings (optional)
  • Security tethering optional and Kensington lock compatible (cables optional)
  • Customised branding options are available orders > 100 units
short_description: The Kube clock can charge many devices including your Apple and Android phones and tablets. Features include built-in cables, Bluetooth speaker, clock and alarm. Finished in white with chrome speaker grills.

name: Kube 5-US Plug
description:
Each of the five (5) Kube chargers contains:

  • Wireless ‘Drop and Charge’ Qi charging
  • Built-in charging cables for Apple lightning, Apple 30 pin and Micro USB
  • Additional charging via two (2) USB ports
  • 18,000 mAh Ultra High capacity battery
  • Provides up to 9 hours of phone charge time
  • Replaceable cables to extend life of the product
  • Security tethering optional and Kensington lock compatible (cables optional)
  • 12 month Warranty
  • Colour: Matt Black
  • Unit: 105mm x 105mm x 58mm
  • Weight: 0.50 kg
  • Customised branding options are available (5+ systems / 25 individual chargers)

The Charging Tray features:

  • 5 charging docks with LED charge indicator lights
  • Programmable “Time Out” feature
  • Carry handles 
  • Colour: Matt Black
  • Packaging: 575mm x 395mm x 186mm
  • Weight: 8.88 kg
short_description: The Kube 5 contains five portable power "kubes" that can charge up to six devices at once - both wirelessly or with built-in cables for Apple & Micro-USB devices. Designed specifically for the hospitality industry for use in lobbies, bars or restaurants.

  • Compact and contemporary design to suit bedside tables
  • Time adjustment buttons located underneath clock to avoid guest changes
  • Built-in cables reduce concierge cable delivery to rooms
  • Replaceable cables to extend life of the product
  • Pairing button for simple guest connection for audio streaming
  • Room programmer for custom adjustment of default settings (optional)
  • Security tethering optional and Kensington lock compatible (cables optional)
  • Customised branding options are available orders > 100 units
